item.title: About
item.description: Me Link to heading My name is Samuel and I am living in the french part of Switzerland. I am currently working as a senior security engineer for Kudelski IoT. I have interests in home automation, SDR, hardware and software security, and more. I am passionate about traveling, cooking, wine tasting and discovering new things. This Blog Link to heading The aim of this blog is to share my security knowledge acquired over the years, as well as interesting links, articles or tools that I came across.
